mutants.code:
def findLargestSumSubarray(arr):
    maxSoFar = float('-inf')
    maxEndingHere = 1
    start = 0
    end = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        maxEndingHere += arr[i]
        if maxEndingHere < arr[i]:
            maxEndingHere = arr[i]
            start = i
        if maxSoFar < maxEndingHere:
            maxSoFar = maxEndingHere
            end = i
    return arr[start:end + 1]
